## OWebConfigs.set() method

Updates a given config with the given value.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
set<T extends keyof U>(config: T, value: U[T]): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  config | T | The config name. |
|  value | U\[T\] | The new value. |
